about_the_game:
Step into the chaos of a relentless zombie apocalypse in this action-packed first-person shooter demo, inspired by the classic Call of Duty zombie modes. This demo offers a taste of intense, fast-paced gameplay where your survival instincts are your greatest weapon.

Detailed Description: In this retro-inspired zombie shooter, you’ll be thrown into a gritty, battle-worn environment where the undead swarm in waves, testing your endurance and strategy. As you scavenge for weapons, every decision counts.

The demo provides a snapshot of the full game's arcade-style action, emphasizing quick reflexes, strategic resource management, and the thrill of surviving against increasingly difficult odds.

Key Features:
Classic Gameplay: Experience the nostalgia of old-school zombie shooters with modern enhancements.

Weapon Scavenging: Find and upgrade a variety of weapons to stay ahead of the undead horde.

Whether you're a veteran of classic zombie shooters or new to the genre, this demo will give you a thrilling preview of the intense survival action that awaits in the full game.

content_descriptors.notes: This is a shooting game. You will have three weapon choices, axe, and two separate guns. You will be shooting zombie like creatures who look like the undead. There is blood splatter, and noises of shots fired.

name: Zombie invasion Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: 2 ghz or higher
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A retro-inspired first-person zombie shooter where you fend off relentless waves of the undead. Scavenge for weapons and survive as long as possible in a fast-paced, action-packed experience. Perfect for fans of classic arcade-style zombie survival games.
